active_incidents.title: Spreadsheet data added using workflows may be incorrect

notes.body: We’ve identified an issue where using the workflow tool to add a row to a spreadsheet is mistakenly inserting incorrect time information, causing errors when attempting to retrieve spreadsheet data. We’re investigating and will let you know as soon as we know more. We appreciate your patience in the meantime.

active_incidents.title: Some users might have trouble with posts

notes.body: We're still investigating this issue impacting creating and editing posts. We appreciate your continued patience as we work towards a solution.
We are continuing to investigate this issue. Apologies for any disruption caused by this - we'll let you know as soon as we find out more.

Some users may be experiencing long delays when creating and editing posts. 

We're actively looking into this, and we'll report back as more information becomes available. We apologize for the disruption.
